name: Rogue Alchemist
description:
You are Alchie, a maltreated servant of an evil Alchemist. Delve into his strange basement, slay his monstrous pets, and find a concocted solution to end him once and for all. Maybe you'll find the path to life everlasting?

Spoiler for end boss recipe below (your time is precious)

Instructions can be found in game under "?" (SHIFT + /)

End Boss Potion Spoiler:

Mix Orange Potion and Blue Potion, making a Harmonious Potion.

Mix Harmonious Potion with a Gold Potion to make a Potion Potion - throw it at the boss.
